sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT C.ORGNZT_NM FROM COMTNORGNZTINFO C WHERE C.ORGNZT_ID = G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , (SELECT C.ORGNZT_NM FROM COMTNORGNZTINFO C WHERE C.ORGNZT_ID = G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CD.CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND ROWNUM = 1) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_NM , NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) AS GIS_ASSETS_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN , NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI,0) GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI , G.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD , G.GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT , G.GIS_ASSETS_RM , G.REG_USR , TO_CHAR(G.REGISTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGISTDT , G.UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(G.UPDTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDTDT , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD , G.GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , G.DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR , G.DRW_LST_SEQ , G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT , G.ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G WHERE 1=1
G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=UPPER(#gisAssetsCd#)
G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN='Y'
(G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN <> 'Y' OR G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN IS NULL)
G.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsNm# || '%'
G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD=#gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD=#gisAssetsLocCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD=#gisAssetsQuayCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM=#gisAssetsLnm#
G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB=#gisAssetsLnmSub#
G.ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD=#erpAssetsSeCd#
G.ERP_ASSETS_NO=#erpAssetsNo#
G.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ=#erpAssetsNoSeq#
G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD=#operDeptCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD=#mngDeptCd#
ORDER BY G.REGISTDT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G WHERE 1=1
G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=UPPER(#gisAssetsCd#)
G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN='Y'
(G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN <> 'Y' OR G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN IS NULL)
G.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsNm# || '%'
G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD=#gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD=#gisAssetsLocCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD=#gisAssetsQuayCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM=#gisAssetsLnm#
G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB=#gisAssetsLnmSub#
G.ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD=#erpAssetsSeCd#
G.ERP_ASSETS_NO=#erpAssetsNo#
G.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ=#erpAssetsNoSeq#
G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD=#operDeptCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD=#mngDeptCd#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GIS_ASSETS_CD_F SET UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDTDT = SYSDATE , ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN = #erpAssetsDisuseRegistYn# , ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN = #erpAssetsDisuseRsn# WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd#
